mapper.select: select proj_title, proj_estimate, proj_reqr_person, proj_career, proj_start_date, proj_apply_deadline from project where member_no = #{member_no}
select p.proj_title, p.proj_estimate, p.apply_mem, p.proj_work_place, p.proj_reqr_skill, p.proj_start_date from project p, apply a where p.proj_id = a.proj_id and p.member_no = #{member_no}
select p.member_no, p.career, p.skill from partners p, followpartners f where p.member_no = f.target_member and f.source_member = #{member_no} and rownum <= 5 order by f.FOLLOWING_DATE desc
select c.ADDRESS1 from member m left outer join client c on m.member_no = c.member_no where m.member_no = #{member_no}

select member_no, birthday, career, skill, prefered_area, hashtag, available_date, profile from( select rownum rn, MEMBER_NO, substr(BIRTHDAY,1,2) as BIRTHDAY, CAREER, SKILL, PREFERED_AREA, HASHTAG, AVAILABLE_DATE, PROFILE ) from partners
where PREFERED_AREA like '%'||#{address}||'%' or
skill like '%'||#{skillList}||'%'
)
where rownum <= 5
